history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: exp,ex_lim_ext. qsimpl time: 1 use: Rinv_involutive,exp,ex_lim_ext.

exceptions.tactic: apply ex_lim_ext with (g := fun y => / exp (- y)).
exceptions.exn: In environment i, p : nat x : R_AbsRing Unable to unify "exists l : Rbar, is_lim (fun y : R => / exp (- y)) ?M2367 l" with "match i with | 0%nat => True | S n => ex_derive (Derive_n (fun x : R => x ^ p) n) x end".
The LHS of Rinv_involutive (/ / _) does not match any subterm of the goal

original: apply ex_lim_ext with (g := fun y => / exp (- y)). - intros y. rewrite Rinv_involutive. reflexivity. - apply ex_lim_inv. + apply ex_lim_comp with (g := fun y => - y). * apply ex_lim_exp_p. * apply ex_lim_opp. apply ex_lim_id. * apply Rbar_locally'_inv_inf with (g := fun y => - y). -- intros. apply Ropp_neq_0_compat. unfold Rbar_locally'. now exists 0. + intro H. unfold Lim in H. apply (exp_Ropp 0) in H. apply exp_pos in H. lra.
